trans-unit.source: Allows security actions for <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission" /> to be applied to code using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 允許將 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission" /> 的安全性動作套用至使用宣告式安全性的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> that is used.
trans-unit.target: 宣告所允許的範圍需視<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>用。

trans-unit.source: The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time.
trans-unit.target: 安全性屬性所宣告的安全性資訊儲存在屬性目標的中繼資料，而且由系統在執行階段存取。

trans-unit.source: Security attributes are used only for declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 安全性屬性僅用於宣告式安全性。

trans-unit.source: For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class.
trans-unit.target: 命令式安全性，為使用對應的權限類別。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute> class, follow the security action with the permission(s) that are being requested.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute>類別，請遵循與目前要求的權限的安全性動作。

trans-unit.source: Each security permission that can be requested, as defined in the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag> enumeration, has a corresponding property in the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 中所定義，可能會要求每個安全性權限<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>列舉型別中有對應的屬性<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute>類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, to demand the ability to access unmanaged code, follow the demand statement with the property setting that is being requested, as follows: `SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.Demand, UnmanagedCode=true)`.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，若要要求存取 unmanaged 程式碼的能力，請遵循正在要求、，如下所示的屬性設定的要求陳述式： `SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.Demand, UnmanagedCode=true)`。

trans-unit.source: An exception to the equivalence between the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag> enumeration and the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute> properties is that the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.AllFlags> enumeration value is represented by the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAttribute.Unrestricted%2A> property (inherited from the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAttribute> class).
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況是否等價<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>列舉型別和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute>屬性是<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.AllFlags>列舉值由<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAttribute.Unrestricted%2A>屬性 (繼承自<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAttribute>類別)。

trans-unit.source: To demand all security permissions, specify `Unrestricted=true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要要求所有的安全性權限，指定`Unrestricted=true`。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to assert that all this code's callers have the requisite permission for the operation is declared.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否宣告了權限，可判斷提示這個程式碼的所有呼叫端都要具有此作業的必要權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if permission to assert is declared; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已宣告判斷提示的權限，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether code has permission to perform binding redirection in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示程式碼是否有權限執行應用程式組態檔中的繫結重新導向。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if code can perform binding redirects; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果程式碼可以執行繫結重新導向，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This permission allows redirection of .NET Framework assemblies that have been unified, as well as other assemblies found outside the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 此權限可讓.NET Framework 組件，有已整合，以及找到.NET Framework 外部的其他組件重新導向。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to manipulate <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> is declared.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否宣告管理 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> 的權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if permission to manipulate <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> is declared; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果宣告管理 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> 的權限，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to alter or manipulate domain security policy is declared.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否宣告變更或管理定義域安全性原則的權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if permission to alter or manipulate security policy in an application domain is declared; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已宣告變更或管理應用程式定義域中的安全性原則的權限，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to alter or manipulate evidence is declared.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否宣告變更或管理辨識項的權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the ability to alter or manipulate evidence is declared; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要變更或管理辨識項的使用權限已宣告，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to view and manipulate security policy is declared.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否宣告檢視和管理安全性原則的權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if permission to manipulate security policy is declared; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要檢視和管理安全性原則的使用權限已宣告，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to manipulate the current principal is declared.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否宣告管理目前主體的權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if permission to manipulate the current principal is declared; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果管理目前主要物件的使用權限已宣告，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to manipulate threads is declared.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否宣告管理執行緒的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if permission to manipulate threads is declared; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果管理執行緒的使用權限已宣告，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Threading.Thread>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Threading.Thread>。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立及傳回新的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission" /> that corresponds to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission" />，會對應至這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be called by the security system, never by application code.
trans-unit.target: 只應該由應用程式程式碼永遠不會由安全性系統中，呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 在編譯時期，屬性會將安全性宣告轉換成中繼資料的序列化形式。

trans-unit.source: Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 建立中繼資料中的宣告式安全性資料，從 的權限，此方法會傳回對應至這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to execute code is declared.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已宣告執行程式碼的權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if permission to execute code is declared; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已宣告執行程式碼的權限，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A demand for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Execution> permission at the assembly level is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 要求<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Execution>組件層級的權限會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If an assembly has the right to execute, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Execution> permission is automatically granted, and setting the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.Execution%2A> property to either `true` or `false` has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果組件具有的權限執行，<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Execution>權限會自動授與，而設定<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.Execution%2A>屬性設為`true`或`false`沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets all permission flags comprising the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission" /> permissions.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission" /> 使用權限的所有使用權限旗標。

trans-unit.source: One or more of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag" /> values combined using a bitwise OR.
trans-unit.target: 使用位元的 OR 運算結合一個或以上的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set this property to an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將這個屬性設定為無效的值。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag" /> for the valid values.
trans-unit.target: 如需有效的值，請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether code can plug into the common language runtime infrastructure, such as adding Remoting Context Sinks, Envoy Sinks and Dynamic Sinks.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出程式碼是否可插入 Common Language Runtime 基礎結構，例如加入遠端內容接收、Envoy 接收和動態接收。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if code can plug into the common language runtime infrastructure; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果程式碼可以外掛至 Common Language Runtime 基礎結構，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether code can configure remoting types and channels.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出程式碼是否可以設定遠端類型和通道。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if code can configure remoting types and channels; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果程式碼可以設定遠端型別和通道，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether code can use a serialization formatter to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示程式碼是否可以使用序列化格式子，將物件序列化或還原序列化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if code can use a serialization formatter to serialize or deserialize an object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果程式碼可以使用序列化格式子來序列化或還原序列化物件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to bypass code verification is declared.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已宣告略過程式碼驗證的權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if permission to bypass code verification is declared; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果略過程式碼驗證的使用權限已宣告，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This is a powerful permission that should be granted only to highly trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這是功能強大的權限只應該授與高度信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to call unmanaged code is declared.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已宣告呼叫 Unmanaged 程式碼的權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if permission to call unmanaged code is declared; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫 Unmanaged 程式碼的使用權限已宣告，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
